summary: Caller requested sensitive financial credentials (codes/card/account details). Caller appears to impersonate a bank, card network, or fraud/security department. Transcript matches known scam script patterns. Final risk: high (100/100).

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: This is Sammy Daniel calling you from off-coast fraud watch divisions

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: You're in the security of your visa mastercard accounts due to the increase in computer related frauds

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: We've made some very important changes for our policies, and I just want to beat you on the changes

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Okay, all right. Oh one second

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Standard procedure that we're telling all the customers that now that because of computer related frauds

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Called the card holders are held responsible to the mastercard and visa

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: So right now what we're doing is we're providing protection. So right now we underwrite everything

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: That's any extra fraud charge on your credit card. We underwrite it right away

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: You'll also be receiving a package in about seven to ten days. Oh, okay via UPS

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Yeah, and in this package you'll find stickers and also a registration form on this registration form

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: You write down all your account numbers

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Telephone cards the department store cards any other cards, okay that you have a console

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Oh, yeah, that we can protect all of them now today. I will be giving you a new security code

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Okay, all right now in order for me to give you a security code

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: I just need to ensure that you are the right, you know authorized card holder

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: So if you can just confirm your card with me, okay, all right, which card are you gonna be using your visa your mastercard?
